copy.headline: Audits
copy.subheadline: You'll find here the list of our audits and code review reports.

microcopy.text: Neodyme: Marinade Validator Bonds
microcopy.purpose: Identifies the auditor and audit subject

microcopy.text: Neodyme audited Marinade's on-chain Validator Bond program during March and April of 2024. The scope of this audit was focused on technical security, with further considerations about operational security.
microcopy.purpose: Provides context about audit scope and timing

microcopy.text: The auditors found that Marinade's Validator Bond program comprised a clean design and above-standard code quality, relying on the industry-standard Anchor framework.

In November 2023, Marinade upgraded its smart contract to include several improvements (see this article â†—). To ensure that the code remains as solid as it has always been, two audits were conducted on the upgraded version of the smart contract. They are available below:
Audit reports
Code review reports
453KB PDF

trustSignals: Named auditor (Neodyme) with specific audit dates
Focus on technical security and operational security
Clean design and above-standard code quality findings
